scenario.name: registration
scenario.send:
REGISTER sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> User-Agent: SLICK IMS 4.0.0 Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 </send>
<recv response="100" optional="true"> </recv>
<recv response="401" auth="true" rtd="true"> </recv>
